Frequently Asked Questions

Yes, our core tools including the Skill Translator, Resume Generator, and ATS Scanner are completely free for all veterans. We believe in removing barriers to successful transitions, and our mission is to support as many veterans as possible.

Our Skill Translator is built on a comprehensive database of military-to-civilian skill mappings developed in collaboration with HR professionals, veterans, and industry experts. It's continuously updated based on user feedback and changing industry requirements to ensure high accuracy and relevance.

Yes, you can either start from scratch or upload your existing resume to the Resume Generator. The tool will help you optimize your content, structure, and formatting to create an ATS-friendly resume that effectively communicates your military experience in civilian terms.

We're actively developing these features and plan to release them in the coming months. The Video Resume Builder is scheduled for release in Q3 2025, followed by the AI Interview Coach in Q4 2025. Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates on these and other new features.

We offer several partnership opportunities for employers interested in hiring veterans. These include featured job postings, participation in virtual career fairs, and access to our pool of qualified veteran candidates. Please contact our partnerships team at partnerships@veterantransition.org for more information.
